without warning\n\n### üö´ WHAT NOT TO DO\n- **Don't** request huge result sets (use pagination with limits)\n- **Don't** create duplicate folder structures unnecessarily  \n- **Don't** move system files or .obsidian directory contents\n- **Don't** create notes with identical titles (causes conflicts)\n\n### ‚úÖ ALWAYS CONSIDER\n- **User's current context**: What are they working on?\n- **Vault *Called tool*: obsidian-ai-mcp - explore_notes: 
üîç EXPLORE NOTES - Advanced search with multilingual support and powerful filters

PURPOSE: Comprehensive search through notes with content indexing, transliteration, 
and extensive filtering capabilities. One tool for all search needs.

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Multilingual search (Russian ‚Üî English transliteration)
‚Ä¢ Content indexing (searches inside note content, not just titles)
‚Ä¢ Morphological variants (programming ‚Üí program ‚Üí programm)
‚Ä¢ Advanced filtering (tags, dates, folders, content metrics)
‚Ä¢ Flexible sorting and relevance scoring
‚Ä¢ Content preview with highlighted matches

ADVANCED FILTERS:
‚Ä¢ Tag filtering: include_tags=["work", "active"], exclude_tags=["archive"]
‚Ä¢ Date filtering: modified_after="2024-09-01", created_before="2024-12-31"
‚Ä¢ Folder filtering: folders=["Projects"], exclude_folders=["Archive"]
‚Ä¢ Content filtering: min_words=100, has_tasks=True, min_links=2
‚Ä¢ Sorting: sort_by="modified" | "created" | "title" | "relevance"

USE CASES:
‚Ä¢ Basic search: explore_notes("machine learning")
‚Ä¢ Filtered search: explore_notes("productivity", include_tags=["work"], modified_after="2024-09-01")
‚Ä¢ Content discovery: explore_notes("", has_tasks=True, folders=["Projects"])
‚Ä¢ Maintenance: explore_notes("", max_words=50, max_links=0, sort_by="modified")
‚Ä¢ Research: explore_notes("AI", exclude_tags=["draft"], min_words=200)
